com.google.publicalerts.cap

Class CapXmlBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.publicalerts.cap.CapXmlBuilder

  • public class CapXmlBuilder extends java.lang.Object
    Writes an Alert to an XML document. Supports CAP 1.0, 1.1, and 1.2.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_INDENT 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CapXmlBuilder()
      Creates a new XML builder that prints with newlines and 2-space indent.
      CapXmlBuilder(java.lang.Integer indent)
      Creates a new XML builder with the given printing options.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String toXml(AlertOrBuilder alert)
      Writes the given alert to an XML string.
      void toXml(AlertOrBuilder alert, java.io.Writer writer)
      Writes the given alert to XML in the given writer.
      org.w3c.dom.Document toXmlDocument(AlertOrBuilder alert)
      Converts the alert to a document.
      org.w3c.dom.Element toXmlDocument(AlertOrBuilder alert, org.w3c.dom.Document document)
      Converts the alert to an XML element tree rooted at the return node.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • CapXmlBuilder

        public CapXmlBuilder()
        Creates a new XML builder that prints with newlines and 2-space indent.

      • CapXmlBuilder

        public CapXmlBuilder(java.lang.Integer indent)
        Creates a new XML builder with the given printing options.
        Parameters:
        indent - number of spaces to indent each element. If null, do not indent.

    • Method Detail

      • toXml

        public java.lang.String toXml(AlertOrBuilder alert)
        Writes the given alert to an XML string.
        Parameters:
        alert - the alert to convert
        Returns:
        the alert as an XML string

      • toXml

        public void toXml(AlertOrBuilder alert, java.io.Writer writer) throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the given alert to XML in the given writer.
        Parameters:
        alert - the alert to convert
        writer - the writer to write out the XML string
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if there are troubles writing to the writer

      • toXmlDocument

        public org.w3c.dom.Document toXmlDocument(AlertOrBuilder alert)
        Converts the alert to a document.
        Parameters:
        alert - the alert to convert
        Returns:
        the alert as a Document

      • toXmlDocument

        public org.w3c.dom.Element toXmlDocument(AlertOrBuilder alert, org.w3c.dom.Document document)
        Converts the alert to an XML element tree rooted at the return node.
        Parameters:
        alert - the alert to convert
        document - the document used to create the nodes for the element tree
